name: A Perfect Beaching day in Bali
description:
Bali, the island of endless white sand beaches, both discovered or undiscovered is a real paradise for any kind of leisure: sea sporting, relaxing, sunbathing, watching sunset, sunrise, camping, and many more...

In this tour, we gonna use scooter as the main transportation, so if you come in more than 1 person, tell me beforehand so that I can arrange.
